item.title: 阿斯顿-马丁季度亏损低于预期
item.description: 英国豪华汽车制造商阿斯顿-马丁（Aston Martin）周三公布的第三季度亏损小于预期，并重申了全年业绩预期，称正在 "积极管理 "供应链中断问题。【原文：British luxury carmaker Aston Martin reported a smaller-than-expected third-quarter loss on Wednesday and reaffirmed its annual forecast, saying supply chain disruptions are being "proactively managed".】

item.title: Alphabet 财报发布后法兰克福股价上涨 1.8
item.description: 周三，谷歌母公司 Alphabet 的股价在法兰克福上涨了 1.8%，一天前该公司称其人工智能投资 "初见成效"，盈利和营收超过了分析师的预期。【原文：Shares of Google parent Alphabet rose 1.8% in Frankfurt on Wednesday a day after the company said its AI investments were "paying off" as its earnings and revenue came in ahead of analyst's expectations.】

item.title: 中国迫在眉睫的一揽子财政计划将稳定而非促进经济增长
item.description: 正在实施的这些措施代表了一种更加审慎的刺激方法，与以往的全面振兴增长战略有所不同。【原文：The measures in the works represent a more calibrated approach to stimulus, which is a departure from previous all-out strategies to revive growth.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司子公司向林德公司索赔 8.8 亿美元
item.description: 周三的法庭文件显示，俄罗斯天然气巨头俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）的一家子公司向全球工业气体和工程公司林德及其子公司提出了 857 亿卢布（约合 8.79 亿美元）的索赔。【原文：A subsidiary of Russia's gas major Gazprom has filed a claim for 85.7 billion roubles ($879 million) against global industrial gases and engineering company Linde and its subsidiaries, court documents showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行在监管困境中启动结构性改革
item.description: 澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）周三表示，该集团已启动组织架构大调整，旨在精简运营和加强数据分析，同时寻求解决与某些业务监管有关的监管困境。【原文：ANZ Group has unveiled an organisational overhaul, with an aim to streamline operations and enhance data analytics, the Australian lender said on Wednesday as it sought to address regulatory woes surrounding its oversight of certain operations.】

item.title: 法国国家统计和经济研究所（INSEE）：第三季度法国经济增长 0.4
item.description: 法国统计局（INSEE）周三公布的初步数据显示，由于巴黎奥运会的影响，2024年第三季度法国经济增长速度超过预期，从第二季度的0.2%加快至0.4%。【原文：French economic growth beat estimates by accelerating by 0.4% in the third quarter 2024 from 0.2% in the second quarter because of impact of the Paris Olympic Games, preliminary data from statistics agency INSEE showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车第三季度利润下滑，大修迫在眉睫
item.description: 大众汽车公司周三表示，由于核心乘用车部门表现疲软，加上包括车型改款在内的成本高企，该公司第三季度营业利润骤降 42%。【原文：Volkswagen on Wednesday said its third-quarter operating profit plunged 42% as weak performance in the core passenger car unit and high costs, including for model revamps, hit the automaker.】

item.title: 凯捷第三季度销售额下降，下调 2024 年收入目标
item.description: 法国 IT 咨询集团凯捷（Capgemini）周三公布第三季度销售额下降后，下调了全年收入目标。【原文：French IT consulting group Capgemini cut its full-year revenue target after it reported lower third-quarter sales on Wednesday.】

item.title: 第三季度盈利超预期，挪威电信上调全年展望
item.description: 挪威电信运营商挪威电信公司（Telenor）周三公布的第三季度盈利略高于市场预期，并上调了全年业绩展望。【原文：Norwegian telecom operator Telenor raised its full-year outlook after it reported third-quarter earnings slightly more than market expectations on Wednesday.】

item.title: 瑞银第三季度净利润超预期
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group）周三公布，自去年收购老对手瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）以来，该行进行了第一波客户迁移，在成本削减和收入增长的帮助下，季度净利润达到 14 亿美元，超出预期。【原文：UBS Group on Wednesday reported a forecast-beating quarterly net profit of $1.4 billion helped by cost reductions and revenue growth as the bank carried out its first wave of client migrations from Credit Suisse since acquiring its old rival last year.】

item.title: Amundi 第三季度净流入得益于 ETF 需求和亚洲业务
item.description: 欧洲最大的基金管理公司 Amundi 周三公布的季度资金流入量与上一季度持平，这主要得益于对风险规避型产品的持续需求及其亚洲业务的推动。【原文：Amundi , Europe's biggest fund manager, posted in-line quarterly inflows on Wednesday, driven by sustained demand for risk-averse products and its Asian operations.】

item.title: 瑞银公布第三季度股东应占净利润 14 亿美元
item.description: 瑞银集团周三公布，第三季度归属于股东的净利润为 14 亿美元，而分析师在公司提供的民意调查中预测的净利润为 7.4 亿美元。【原文：UBS Group on Wednesday reported a net profit of $1.4 billion attributable to shareholders in the third quarter, which compared with the $740 million forecast by analysts in a company-provided poll.】

item.title: 铃木印度分公司将向丰田公司供应首款电动汽车
item.description: 日本汽车制造商铃木汽车的印度分公司将向丰田汽车供应其首款电动汽车，两家公司周三在一份声明中表示，这标志着双方在绿色汽车领域的首次合作。【原文：Japanese automaker Suzuki Motor's Indian unit will supply its first-ever electric vehicle to Toyota Motor , the two companies said in a statement on Wednesday, marking their first collaboration on green vehicles.】

item.title: 美国投票的不确定性危及绿色能源的初步发展
item.description: 由于美国大选加剧了投资者的戒心，可再生能源类股票在投资者撤退后面临着更大的不确定性，只有部分股票有望受益于利率下调可能带来的资金推动。【原文：Renewable energy shares, reeling from an investor retreat, face extended uncertainty as the U.S. election has added to wariness, leaving only selected stocks poised to benefit from any boost lower interest rates could provide to funding.】

item.title: 大众与工人就薪酬和工厂问题展开第二轮谈判
item.description: 本周三，大众汽车和其强大的工会将就关闭工厂和大规模裁员的管理计划第二次交锋，因为这家欧洲最大的汽车制造商正在努力应对高成本和日益激烈的竞争。【原文：Volkswagen and its powerful unions will lock horns on Wednesday for a second time over management plans for plant closures and mass layoffs, as Europe's biggest automaker battles to cope with high costs and growing competition.】

item.title: 早间竞价从 GDP 数据到科技财报，值得咀嚼的东西很多
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 市场：哈里斯、特朗普的承诺如何让市场对美联储上瘾
item.description: 美联储有可能超越其作为最后贷款人的角色，成为即使在正常时期也需要的市场运作道具，而随着美国总统候选人看起来准备再增加数万亿美元的赤字，压力可能会增加。【原文：The Federal Reserve risks moving beyond its role as a lender of last resort to a prop markets need to function even in normal times, with pressures likely to increase as U.S. presidential candidates look set to add trillions more to deficits.】

item.title: 工会称 IAM 与波音公司举行了 "富有成效的会议
item.description: 国际机械师协会周三表示，该工会与波音公司举行了 "富有成效的面对面会议"，以解决关键的谈判问题。【原文：The International Association of Machinists on Wednesday said the union had "productive face-to-face meeting" with Boeing to address key bargaining issues.】

item.title: 丰田 9 月全球产量连续第 8 个月下降
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周三表示，由于美国和中国这两个最大市场的销量和产量双双下降，9月份全球产量连续第八个月下降。【原文：Toyota Motor said on Wednesday its worldwide production fell for an eighth straight month in September, as both sales and output declined in its two biggest markets, the United States and China.】

item.title: StanChart 第三季度利润增长一倍多，超出预期
item.description: 渣打银行（StanChart）周三公布的第三季度税前利润大幅增长 172%，超过了分析师的预期，原因是降息速度低于预期，继续支撑着这家专注于新兴市场的银行的收入。【原文：Standard Chartered (StanChart) reported a 172% jump in third-quarter pretax profit on Wednesday, ahead of analysts' estimates, as slower-than-expected rate cuts continue to bolster the emerging-market focused lender's revenue.】

item.title: 美国经纪商施瓦布将推出更广泛的隔夜交易平台
item.description: 嘉信理财公司（Charles Schwab Corp）周三在一份声明中说，该公司计划从两周左右开始，将 24 小时交易的范围扩大到美国主要指数的所有股票以及数百种 ETF。【原文：Charles Schwab Corp plans to expand the availability of 24-hour trading to include all stocks in major U.S. indexes as well as hundreds of ETFs beginning in about two weeks, the brokerage said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大选前夕，美国经济在强劲的消费支出中大放异彩
item.description: 美国经济在第三季度可能会保持稳健的增长速度，因为通胀消退和强劲的薪资增长将在充满争议的总统大选前为消费者支出提供动力，而总统大选的焦点将集中在 "钱袋子 "问题上。【原文：The U.S. economy likely maintained a solid pace of growth in the third quarter as subsiding inflation and strong wage gains powered consumer spending ahead of a contentious presidential election set to turn on pocketbook issues.】

item.title: 韩国锌业宣布发行 18 亿美元新股后股价下跌
item.description: 韩国锌业公司宣布增资扩股，发行价值 2.5 万亿韩元（约合 18.1 亿美元）的新股，该公司股价在周三的交易中最多下跌 29.9%，跌至每日下限。【原文：Shares in Korea Zinc fell as much as 29.9% to their daily lower limit in Wednesday's trade, after the company announced a capital increase by issuing new shares worth 2.5 trillion won ($1.81 billion).】

item.title: 中国股市受阻，黄金和比特币走强
item.description: 亚洲股市周三因中国股市疲软而下跌，投资者正在为美国大选的激烈争夺做准备，这场大选可能对世界第二大经济体产生巨大影响，即使中国政府正努力支撑经济增长。【原文：Asia shares eased on Wednesday on the back of weakness in China, as investors brace for a tightly contested U.S. election that could have huge ramifications for the world's second-largest economy, even as Beijing tries to shore up growth.】

item.title: 特朗普就关税发出警告：欧洲将付出 "巨大代价
item.description: 美国共和党总统候选人唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，如果他在 11 月 5 日的大选中获胜，欧盟将不得不为没有购买足够的美国出口商品而 "付出巨大代价"。【原文：Republican U.S. presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Tuesday the European Union would have to "pay a big price" for not buying enough American exports if he won the Nov. 5 election.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀率降至三年半低点，但核心通胀率持续走高将推动澳大利亚央行在 2025 年之前下调通胀率
item.description: 澳大利亚第三季度的消费者价格通胀率放缓至三年半以来的最低点，尽管核心通胀率仍然坚挺，这也强化了市场对澳大利亚央行明年才会开始降息的预期。【原文：Australian consumer price inflation slowed to a 3-1/2 year low in the third quarter, though the core measure was still sticky and reinforced market wagers that the central bank won't start cutting rates until next year.】

item.title: 就业数据公布前美元涨势暂缓，澳元因澳大利亚央行展望而下跌
item.description: 本周宏观经济数据将揭示美国货币政策的走向，美元汇率周三徘徊在三个月高点附近。【原文：The dollar hovered close to a three-month peak on Wednesday in a big week for macroeconomic data that could reveal the path for U.S. monetary policy.】

item.title: 公司董事长表示，必和必拓已脱离英美资源集团
item.description: 必和必拓董事长周三表示，在英美资源集团（Anglo American）的股东今年早些时候投票反对必和必拓的收购方案后，必和必拓已转而关注其他增长机会。【原文：BHP has moved on to focus on other growth opportunities after shareholders of Anglo American voted against its takeover approach earlier this year, the company chairman said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第三季度通胀放缓至 3 年半低点，核心通胀更加顽固
item.description: 澳大利亚第三季度的消费者价格通胀率降至 2021 年初以来的最低点，原因是政府提供了电费退税和汽油价格下跌，而核心通胀率的下降则为最终降息提供了支持。【原文：Australia's consumer price inflation rate fell to its lowest since early 2021 in the third quarter on government rebates on electricity and a drop in gasoline, while a drop in core inflation supported the case for an eventual cut in interest rates.】

item.title: 美国原油库存减少，油价持稳
item.description: 周三，油价因行业数据显示美国原油和汽油库存意外下降而企稳，此前两个交易日，油价因中东敌对行动有望缓解而下跌。【原文：Oil prices stabilised on Wednesday on industry data showing a surprise drop in U.S. crude and gasoline inventories, following two previous sessions of losses on the prospect of hostilities easing in the Middle East.】
